name: 2018 Census of Canadian Academic Librarians

creator.name: Revitt, Eva; Magnus, Ebony; & Wright, John

author.name: Revitt, Eva; Magnus, Ebony; & Wright, John

description: Canada's second census of Canadian academic librarians was conducted by the Canadian Association of Academic Librarians (CAPAL) from June to September, 2018. The goal of the census is to build a comprehensive demographic picture of the profession of academic librarianship by collecting data about librarians working in colleges and university libraries in Canada. It is the intention of CAPAL to share the data for research, policy development, and education purposes.

distribution.name: 2018 Census of Canadian Academic Librarians microdata anonymized.xlsm
